current_company.title: Helping Startups and Businesses in  Fundraising | M&A | Pre-IPO |  Debt  | JV | Project Finance |Private Equity and Investors in Private Investments   ( USA, UK, EU, INDIA , DUBAI, ISRAEL, CANADA, SINGAPORE)

experience.title: Independent partner
experience.description: Webaxis Capital assists you in navigating through the different funding options and grants to help identify the best one for your business needs.We have access to a wide range of funding in the UK, EU, and USA, such as Equity Investment, HNW Angel Investment, Venture Capital, Expansion Capital, Debt Funding, Private Equity and Growth Funding for IPOs, management buy-outs, or overseas expansion.We also help businesses grow via franchising, by assisting with the franchise business model setup and all regulatory requirements to take the offer to market.We provide an initial assessment of the opportunity and assist with strategic planning by helping you produce a compelling offer to the market. We also help with SEIS and EIS registration, plus the preparation and presentation of the business and financial model for submission to investors.We leverage our relationships with investors to gauge appetite and source the best options for your particular business.please feel free to send your pitch deck at dharmendra@webaxiscapital.co.uk
experience.description_html: Webaxis Capital assists you in navigating through the different funding options and grants to help identify the best one for your business needs.We have access to a wide range of funding in the UK, EU, and USA, such as Equity Investment, HNW Angel Investment, Venture Capital, Expansion Capital, Debt Funding, Private Equity and Growth Funding for IPOs, management buy-outs, or overseas expansion.We also help businesses grow via franchising, by assisting with the franchise business model setup and all regulatory requirements to take the offer to market.We provide an initial assessment of the opportunity and assist with strategic planning by helping you produce a compelling offer to the market. We also help with SEIS and EIS registration, plus the preparation and presentation of the business and financial model for submission to investors.We leverage our relationships with investors to gauge appetite and source the best options for your particular business.please feel free to send your pitch deck at dharmendra@webaxiscapital.co.uk
